name: allinoneexpensetracker
description: A modern, full-featured expense tracker web app with a neumorphic design. It allows users to manage income and expenses, view financial reports with charts, and export data to PDF. The app is fully responsive and supports light/dark themes.

scripts.build: esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --jsx=automatic --loader:.ts=tsx --resolve-extensions=.ts,.tsx,.js,.json && copyfiles -u 1 public/**/* dist && copyfiles index.html manifest.json sw.js dist
